Login.password_length: The password must be between 8 and 32 characters

Register.password_length: The password must be between 8 and 32 characters
Register.name: Name
Register.name_length: The name must contain at least 2 characters
Register.surname_length: The nickname must contain at least 2 characters

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
ForgotPassword.description: Enter your CPF and we will send you an email with instructions to reset your password
ForgotPassword.cpf_only_numbers: The CPF should count only numbers
ForgotPassword.success: All good! An email with password reset instructions has been sent to {email}
ForgotPassword.error: An error occurred while sending the password reset email
